title: Secrets Can't Be Kept Forever
description: An advertising salesman facing embezzlement charges takes his son and disappears. As Ace Herron, the crime reporter for a Vermont newspaper, pursues the case, the mystery grows deeper. Who is this man? What happened to the boy? Where did the money go? And does Ace have a rival for his wife's affections?  The answers to these and other questions lead Ace on a journey to uncover dark secrets of the past, deeply hidden secrets which can't be kept forever.  From the acclaimed author of "Sherlock Holmes and the Plague of Dracula" comes a contemporary mystery series, the Ace Herron mysteries.
author: Stephen Seitz
